Smash: Out of The Box

The first thing you need to do to get started with a smash out of the box build, is check your system for compatibility with the smash build-system and software-system. If your host system can meet the five (5) software-class-specifications:

Year: 2018 or compatible:

  • Linux Operating System or Emulation
  • Mozilla NSPR Library
  • GNU Readline Library
  • GNU Open Source Software Build Tools
  • BSD Package Configuration Tool
You can build and run smash out of the box: NOW! or

View the Build Guide and Learn About Build Specification or Learn About Smash Usage.
